1.0.0.name: connect20/Softprodigy_QuickContact
1.0.0.description: The extension allows you to add a floating "Quick Contact" button on every page based on position decided from admin.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
